## Contributing to this resource

The source code for compiling this document is in this github repository: [https://github.com/CrumpLab/AcademicIntegrity](https://github.com/CrumpLab/AcademicIntegrity)

You can contribute to this resource directly by suggesting edits to the .Rmd files and submitting pull requests. You can also use the "issues" tab to leave comments and have discussions.
